title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a REST/CLI API, model library, and Docker images.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; sync/async clients, streaming, chat & embed endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm package `ollama`.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter for Ollama; drop-in LLM & embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured chat WebUI (like ChatGPT) for any Ollama model; Docker one-liner.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama; sync/async, Android friendly, Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for Ollama; simple DSL, streaming support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; chat, manage models offline.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-made Docker-Compose stacks adding Open-WebUI, Gitea, Postgres, Weaviate for RAG.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, RAG, fine-tune, LangGraph, Autogen, CrewAI.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Lightweight Qt6 desktop GUI for Ollama; Windows/Linux/macOS binaries.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake for reproducible Ollama deployments with CUDA & ROCm variants.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled Ollama on AWS EC2 & GCP.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma in a single Docker service.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models; slash commands & threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama for DM and channel conversations; ephemeral mode.

title: ollama-mistral-inspector
summary: Browser tool to visualize Mistral model layers, token probabilities, and attention maps via Ollama.
